lines.setup: Lwaxana relaxes in her guest room on the Enterprise. She beamed over in the night before when nearly everyone was sleeping. Not even her daughter knew she was there.
lines.replicator_command: Replicator, make me a Jestral Tea.
lines.anticipating_replicator_creation: looks at the serving plate distainfully.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_succes: That's much better.' She sighed contentedly. 'Now, time for a visit.'
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_failur: This is atrocious! Certainly not good enough for a Betazoid Ambassador!
